casebody.data:
STATE OF NEW JERSEY, PLAINTIFF-RESPONDENT, v. NICHOLAS DE GROTE, DEFENDANT-APPELLANT. Superior Court of New Jersey Appellate Division Submitted October 31, 1977 Decided November 14, 1977.

Before Judges Conford, Michels and Pressler.

*480Mr. Stanley C. Van Ness, Public Defender, Attorney for the appellant (Mr. Joseph Purrazzella, designated attorney, of counsel and on the brief). Mr. William F. Hyland, Attorney General, attorney for respondent (Mr. Wayne J. Martorelli, Deputy Attorney General, of counsel and on the brief). Per Curiam.

The conviction appealed from is affirmed substantially for the reasons stated by Judge Schiaffo in his opinion reported at 136 N. J. Super. 525 (Law Div. 1975).
